series.title: Studien zu Kultur und Geschichte des ersten Jahrtausends n.Chr. / Studies in the Culture and History of the First Millennium C.E.

bibl.seg: Sabine R. Huebner, Eugenio Garosi, Isabelle Marthot-Santaniello, Matthias Müller, Stefanie Schmidt & Matthias Stern (edd.), Living the End of Antiquity. Individual Histories from Byzantine to Islamic Egypt = Studien zu Kultur und Geschichte des ersten Jahrtausends n.Chr. / Studies in the Culture and History of the First Millennium C.E. 84.
Berlin - Boston, W. de Gruyter, 2020, xiv-250 pp., figg. ISBN 978-3-11-068331-8. €86,95.

Originated in an international conference held at the University of Basel in May 2017. - 15 contributions. - Pp. 1-29: S.R.H., E.G., I.M.-S., M.M., S.S. & M.S., Introduction: Individual Histories From Byzantine to Islamic Egypt: 1. The setting; - 2. Chronology and geography; - 3. Prospects and limitations of the evidence; - 4. Politics and administration; - 5. Social hierarchies; - 6. Law and legal practice; - 7. Religion; - 8. Economy; - 9. Language, literature, and education. - I. Servants to the Rulers, Masters of the Land: Governors, Provincial Authorities, and Great Landowners. - II. Village Authorities and Leading Families at the Intersection of State and Society. - III. Patterns of Daily Life in a Time of Change. - Index of names. Index locorum.
Huebner Garosi Marthot-Santaniello Müller Schmidt Stern
